author: Krispyant

text:
About 4 years ago at a flea market, I spent 30 bucks on a SNES system that came bundled with this game. I don't think the guy knew he had about 80 dollars just in this game alone.

Like many of you have said, playing this game is a truly unique experience. The concept behind it, coupled with the storyline and the beautiful music is just... not very common in games. This is a true masterpiece.
author: The Julian Lopez

text: I just recently got myself a copy of this game. I never heard about it before until I saw it in a list of some of the rarest and most valuable snes games and damn, I can't believe I never heard about it before, it's so addicting!
